gobblin.runtime.locks

Interface JobLock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ListenableJobLock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileBasedJobLock, ZookeeperBasedJobLock

    public interface JobLock
extends Closeable
    A interface for claiming exclusive right to proceed for each scheduled run of a job.

    By acquiring a JobLock before a scheduled run of a job can proceed, it is guaranteed that no more than one instance of a job is running at any time.

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        void lock()
   throws JobLockException
        Acquire the lock.
        Throws:
        JobLockException - thrown if the JobLock fails to be acquired

      • unlock

        void unlock()
     throws JobLockException
        Release the lock.
        Throws:
        JobLockException - thrown if the JobLock fails to be released

      • tryLock

        boolean tryLock()
         throws JobLockException
        Try locking the lock.
        Returns:
        true if the lock is successfully locked, false if otherwise.
        Throws:
        JobLockException - thrown if the JobLock fails to be acquired

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked()
          throws JobLockException
        Check if the lock is locked.
        Returns:
        if the lock is locked
        Throws:
        JobLockException - thrown if checking the status of the JobLock fails
